H0.text: Who wrote the 1790’s work “Travels in the Interior of Africa”. James Bruce

H1.text: Who wrote the 1790’s work “Travels in the Interior of Africa”. David Livingstone

H2.text: Who wrote the 1790’s work “Travels in the Interior of Africa”. Heinrich Barth

H3.text: Who wrote the 1790’s work “Travels in the Interior of Africa”. Mungo Park

A4.text: Heinrich Barth's Travels and Discoveries in North and Central Africa were published between 1857–1858.

A5.text: Barth's work was considered one of the finest of its kind, being cited by Darwin.
